mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALLERY_REVIEW( ART_TITLE, GALLERY_ID, GALLERY_NICKNAME, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_RATE ) VALUES( #{artTitle}, #{galleryId}, #{galleryNickname}, NOW(), #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewRate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GALLERY_REVIEW WHERE GALLERY_ID = #{galleryId} AND ART_TITLE = #{artTitle}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GALLERY_REVIEW WHERE GALLERY_ID = #{galleryId} AND ART_TITLE = #{artTitle}
